price: Haa dhorgamu; yoo inni (Abuu Jahal) dhorgamuu baate, sammuu qabna.
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
